body: There are acturally 48 Variables in the simulation output. But the "readEPResult" only reads several of them. How can I get all of them in Grasshopper if I want to know details about sensible and latent heating/cooling energy?
topic: How to get all energy simulation outputs?

replies.body:
Hi Yi,

which air system are you simulating if I may ask?

-Devang
Sorry, my bad. I didn't see there is a "read_HVAC_result" Component

Hi Yi, you can add other specific variables in this way: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/LacygCl0qQJ98zZbI149kfm4NJrWf-rSlPyhzz510ywPG8RaQQmxt83sWLGXZjkyBQkkU*EK9cx0alebfYa7e7mhG2mdQW0f/add_output.png) Antonello
